1: כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> נַ֥עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>[was] a child</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>When Israel</n> וָאֹהֲבֵ֑הוּ <sup>157 </sup> <n>then I loved</n> וּמִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>out of Egypt</n> קָרָ֥אתִי <sup>7121 </sup> <n>him and called</n> לִבְנִֽי׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>my son</n>
2: קָרְא֖וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>[As] they called</n> לָהֶ֑ם כֵּ֚ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>the more</n> הָלְכ֣וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>them so they went</n> מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from them</n> לַבְּעָלִ֣ים <sup>1168 </sup> <n>unto Baalim</n> יְזַבֵּ֔חוּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>they sacrificed</n> וְלַפְּסִלִ֖ים <sup>6456 </sup> <n>to graven images</n> יְקַטֵּרֽוּן׃ <sup>6999 </sup> <n>and burned incense</n>
3: וְאָנֹכִ֤י <sup>595 </sup> <n>is I</n> תִרְגַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <sup>7270 </sup> <n>taught</n> לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> קָחָ֖ם <sup>3947 </sup> <n>taking</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> זְרֽוֹעֹתָ֑יו <sup>2220 </sup> <n>them by their arms</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>but they knew</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> רְפָאתִֽים׃ <sup>7495 </sup> <n>not that I healed</n>
4: בְּחַבְלֵ֨י <sup>2256 </sup> <n>them with cords</n> אָדָ֤ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of a man</n> אֶמְשְׁכֵם֙ <sup>4900 </sup> <n>I drew</n> בַּעֲבֹת֣וֹת <sup>5688 </sup> <n>with bands</n> אַהֲבָ֔ה <sup>160 </sup> <n>of love</n> וָאֶהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> לָהֶ֛ם כִּמְרִ֥ימֵי <sup>7311 </sup> <n>and I was to them as they that take off</n> עֹ֖ל <sup>5923 </sup> <n>the yoke</n> עַ֣ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>from</n> לְחֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>3895 </sup> <n>on their jaws</n> וְאַ֥ט <sup>328 </sup> <n>secret</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אוֹכִֽיל׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>meat</n>
5: לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>They will not</n> יָשׁוּב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>He shall not return</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>into the land</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> וְאַשּׁ֖וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>but the Assyrian</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מַלְכּ֑וֹ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>shall be his king</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> מֵאֲנ֖וּ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>because they refused</n> לָשֽׁוּב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>to return</n>
6: וְחָלָ֥ה <sup>2342 </sup> <n>shall abide</n> חֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>And the sword</n> בְּעָרָ֔יו <sup>5892 </sup> <n>on his cities</n> וְכִלְּתָ֥ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>and shall consume</n> בַדָּ֖יו <sup>905 </sup> <n>his branches</n> וְאָכָ֑לָה <sup>398 </sup> <n>and devour</n> מִֽמֹּעֲצ֖וֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>4156 </sup> <n>[them] because of their own counsels</n>
7: וְעַמִּ֥י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And my people</n> תְלוּאִ֖ים <sup>8511 </sup> <n>are bent</n> לִמְשֽׁוּבָתִ֑י <sup>4878 </sup> <n>to backsliding</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עַל֙ <sup>5920 </sup> <n>them to the most High</n> יִקְרָאֻ֔הוּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>from me though they called</n> יַ֖חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>none at all</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>None</n> יְרוֹמֵם׃ <sup>7311 </sup> <n>would exalt</n>
8: אֵ֞יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>How</n> אֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>How shall I give thee up</n> אֶפְרַ֗יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> אֲמַגֶּנְךָ֙ <sup>4042 </sup> <n>deliver</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> אֵ֚יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>How</n> אֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>make</n> כְאַדְמָ֔ה <sup>126 </sup> <n>Admah</n> אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֖ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>appoint</n> כִּצְבֹאיִ֑ם <sup>6636 </sup> <n>Zeboiim</n> נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>is turned</n> עָלַי֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>within</n> לִבִּ֔י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>care for</n> יַ֖חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> נִכְמְר֥וּ <sup>3648 </sup> <n>are kindled</n> נִחוּמָֽי׃ <sup>5150 </sup> <n>within me my repentings</n>
9: לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I will not execute</n> חֲר֣וֹן <sup>2740 </sup> <n>the fierceness</n> אַפִּ֔י <sup>639 </sup> <n>of mine anger</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אָשׁ֖וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>I will not return</n> לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <sup>7843 </sup> <n>to destroy</n> אֶפְרָ֑יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אֵ֤ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>for I [am] God</n> אָֽנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>in</n> בְּקִרְבְּךָ֣ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> קָד֔וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>the Holy One</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and I will not</n> אָב֖וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>of thee and I will not enter</n> בְּעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>into the city</n>
10: אַחֲרֵ֧י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> יֵלְכ֖וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will walk</n> כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>like a lion</n> יִשְׁאָ֑ג <sup>7580 </sup> <n>he shall roar</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> יִשְׁאַ֔ג <sup>7580 </sup> <n>when he shall roar</n> וְיֶחֶרְד֥וּ <sup>2729 </sup> <n>shall tremble</n> בָנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>then the children</n> מִיָּֽם׃ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>from the west</n>
11: יֶחֶרְד֤וּ <sup>2729 </sup> <n>They shall tremble</n> כְצִפּוֹר֙ <sup>6833 </sup> <n>as a bird</n> מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>out of Egypt</n> וּכְיוֹנָ֖ה <sup>3123 </sup> <n>and as a dove</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> אַשּׁ֑וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>of Assyria</n> וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֥ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and I will place</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <sup>1004 </sup> <n>them in their houses</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
12: סְבָבֻ֤נִי <sup>5437 </sup> <n>compasseth</n> בְכַ֙חַשׁ֙ <sup>3585 </sup> <n>me about with lies</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> וּבְמִרְמָ֖ה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>with deceit</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>but Judah</n> עֹ֥ד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>is also</n> רָד֙ <sup>7300 </sup> <n>yet ruleth</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> אֵ֔ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>with God</n> וְעִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> קְדוֹשִׁ֖ים <sup>6918 </sup> <n>with the saints</n> נֶאֱמָֽן׃ <sup>539 </sup> <n>and is faithful</n>
